idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.0.1324

descript.abstract: This data set consists of digital data for protected sites in Bulgaria.
descript.purpose: REQUIRED: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.

citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: CDDA_BG06_20130314_04_04

timeperd.current: REQUIRED: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.

sngdate.caldate: REQUIRED: The year (and optionally month, or month and day) for which the data set corresponds to the ground.

idinfo.accconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the data set.
idinfo.useconst: REQUIRED: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for using the data set after access is granted.

cntinfo.cntpos: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.0.1324

citRespParty.rpPosName: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Dataset contains digital boundaries for 416 Protected Site (BG06), presented as polygons. The column names are: FID, Shape (polygon), Name_ENG (text - 50), SITE_CODE (integer -9), DESIG_ABBR (text - 4).

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntinfo.cntpos: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

mdContact.rpPosName: Senior expert in Monitoring of Biodiversity, Forest ecosystems and Soils Department

dataLineage.statement: Dataset was created using as basic layer Bulgarian cadastre for 2011. Digital boundaries were converted with software CADIS from Baltic coordinate system (70) into WGS 1984 UTM Zone 35N.
